short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share web links which you browse, in social network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For some of the web pages, share buttons may be missing; in that case, it is cumbersome to share the page. This little extension just helps to share any of the web pages. On top of that, this little extension, wouldn't collect users data or browsing data in the backend.
